channel.title: Need Help i keep getting errors
channel.description:
everytime when i ask for help nobody ever helps me they just say something and it doenst fix it. ok well my promblem is when i try to log on to my server and i have my port forward already made the rule i think my promblem is that im using a wireless connection to my computer and i have my modem plugged into my router then pluged into my wireless router?? how can i fix it so the rule will run the router to the wireless to the computer so i can get my server running?????
Pls help this is my only promblem

item.title: Need Help i keep getting errors
item.dc:creator: @redbird5122 redbird5122
item.description:
@redbird5122 wrote:

when i create host and try to sign on it keeps saying no response to server idk why it says that

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help i keep getting errors
item.dc:creator: @cant_touch_this93 cant touch this93
item.description:
@cant_touch_this93 wrote:

[quote=“VorargC, post:10, topic:92757”][quote author=cant touch this93 link=topic=134848.msg1300847#msg1300847 date=1178942476]

try logging in with 0.0.0.0 as ip
[/quote] no ,…dont do that. when you log onto your own server you eather type in localhost or leave it blank…

Um no, your an idiot.

Edit:
go to no-ip.com
make a new account
Go to hosts/redirect
Click Add
type name you want, and the domain you want…
click create host,
it should work then[/quote]how am i an idiot? im talking about when hes logging onhis server…if your server name is dumbscape.no-ip.infom, you wouldent type in dumbscape.no-ip.info to get on your own server…

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help i keep getting errors
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

[quote=“cant touch this93, post:9, topic:92757”][quote author=VorargC link=topic=134848.msg1300843#msg1300843 date=1178942405]
try logging in with 0.0.0.0 as ip
[/quote] no ,…dont do that. when you log onto your own server you eather type in localhost or leave it blank…[/quote]
Um no, your an idiot.

Edit:
go to no-ip.com
make a new account
Go to hosts/redirect
Click Add
type name you want, and the domain you want…
click create host,
it should work then

Read full topic
